text: A skeleton crew is the minimum number of personnel needed to operate and maintain an item. Skeleton crew may also refer to: ==Music== *Skeleton Crew (band), an American experimental rock and jazz group *Skeleton Crew, an American record label co-founded by Frank Iero *Skeleton Crew, a 2015 album by Madisen Ward and the Mama Bear ==Other media== *Skeleton Crew, a 1985 collection of short fiction by Stephen King *Skeleton Crew (comics), a group of Marvel Comics supervillains *Skeleton Crew (film), a Finnish horror film *The Skeleton Crew (book), a 2014 true-crime book *Bones: Skeleton Crew a web series *a television series episode
title: Skeleton crew (disambiguation)
